name: claude-hooks
description: Safety and automation hooks for Claude Code

plugins.name: command-safety
plugins.description: Blocks dangerous commands (rm, kubectl delete, terraform destroy)

plugins.name: git-hooks
plugins.description: Enforces safe git workflows (no commits to main, branch naming)

plugins.name: file-protection
plugins.description: Protects CLAUDE.md and warns on large files

plugins.name: env-protection
plugins.description: Blocks access to .env files, preventing accidental secret exposure
